# Christopher N Maymon, PhD

**Experimental Psychologist | VR Developer | Data Analyst**

I am a psychological scientist, teacher, and research consultant.

I specialize in designing **ecologically valid experiments** capable of yielding answers to complex psychological questions. In my [research](research.qmd), I integrate emerging technologies‚Äîsuch like **virtual reality**, **biosensors**, and **artificial intelligence** to study human behavior as it occurs in the real world.

An experimentalist at heart, I am constantly searching for research questions that can be resolved through carefully designed experiments.

I provide end-to-end [consulting services](consulting.qmd) to research labs, companies, and government agencies.
